oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Plaster study for head of Nathan Bedford Forrest statue
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Artist Charles Niehaus executed this study in painted plaster, 3.4 inches x 2.37 inches x 2.43 inches, of Forrest's head for the statue eventually cast and placed in Forrest Park in Memphis, Tenn. The hair style in this model is different from that on the actual statue.
